description: Update a time card time change.
permissions: Admins may update time card time changes; non-admins may update them only if they are allowed to create a time card approval for the related time card (per TimeCardApprovalPolicy#create?), and only while the change is unprocessed.
side_effects: Updates a time card time change record.
validation_notes: Requires a time card time change ID argument. Only unprocessed time card time changes can be updated. At least one attribute must be provided; otherwise the request is rejected. If --time-changes-attributes is provided it must be valid JSON and include at least one change. If --skip-quantity-validation is not true, server validates total hours are within allowed range.

flags.name: --time-changes-attributes
flags.description: Time change attributes as JSON object
flags.validation: If provided, must be valid JSON and include at least one time change.
